description: Single-file schema for a self-contained, single-directory test block with substrate + semantic transport + ops + geometry validation and proof hardening.

checks.description: Assertions across geometry invariants, ops behaviors, semantic transport, security/governance, and performance.

matrix.description: Audit mapping of claim → (program step, check).

dir_merkle_root.description: Merkle root over sorted [path, sha256] pairs.

manifest.description: All files in the block directory. Out-of-dir references are forbidden.

holonomy.description: Holonomy tested intrinsically via geodesic loops and intrinsic transport; no chart rectangles or discrete Euclidean ladders.

retraction_native.description: Intrinsic hyperbolic retraction; no projection or Euclidean approximation.

tolerances.description: Ontological tolerances: small scales are real; do not annihilate beings, holonomy, or causal inner products.

vector_transport_native.description: Intrinsic parallel transport preserving worldline continuity.

program.description: Sequence of deterministic steps; args may reference $fixtures.*, $substrate.*, $semantics.*, $prev.*, $env.*

title: HyperSync Unified Conformance Block
